title: Episode 95 - The Soviet Empire 1953 -1960
itunes:author: The History of the Cold War Podcast
itunes:summary: In this episode, we examine events in the  Soviet Union from 1953-1960  and events during the Cold War from the Soviet perspective during the  same period. We examine the power struggle after the death of Stalin and significant economic, social and political challenges the Soviet Union faced and how Khrushchev attempted to meet those challenges.
